channel.title: Theme parks on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Theme parks on FinanClub

item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:87 Chances: Comcast Corp.’s expansion into internet-based services and smart TV technology with Sky Stream and Sky Glass could provide significant growth opportunities in the digital services market. The addition of new theme park lands and the growth of Peacock streaming service indicate diversification and potential for increased revenue streams.
